title: Here is some comfort for poor cavaleeres: or, The Duke of Yorks speech to the Parliament of England, concerning his fathers old souldiers; also, a relation of the forty five sail of ships that have crost the ocean ... Prince Robert doth represent the king's royal person in Portugal. They'l fetch a queen with store of Indian treasure ... To a pleasant tune called Moncks March, or, Maids will say nay and take it.
